post.author: Admin
post.title: OMEA State Contest - We Need Your Help This Weekend!
post.description:
Hello Band Families!
As you know, we are hosting the OMEA State Contest this weekend, April 28 -29
post.content:
Hello Band Families!

As you know, we are hosting the OMEA State Contest this weekend, April 28 -29. This is a FUNDRAISER for our Band Program!!!

We are a TEAM! We will only succeed if the entire team helps out with our event. The time slots are short and each job is EASY and FUN! You will get a chance to meet fellow band families, hear the other bands and represent our program with pride!

In order for this weekend to be a success, we need YOU! The following slots do not have any volunteers or maybe not enough volunteers to help us run this event.

GYM 2 Stage Door
Friday 3:30 – 6:30 NEED 3 more volunteers
Friday 8:30 – 11:30 NO Volunteers
Saturday 11:30 – 2:30 NO Volunteers
Program –Heritage Hall
Saturday 7:30 – 11:30 NO Volunteers
Saturday 11:30 – 2:30 NO Volunteers
Program – Gym 2
Friday 3:30 – 6:30 NO Volunteers
Saturday 7:30 – 11:30 NO Volunteers
Saturday 11:30 – 2:30 NO Volunteers
Sight reading
Friday 3:30 – 6:30 NO Volunteers
Community room
Friday 6:00 – 9:00 NO Volunteers
Concessions
Saturday 7:30 – 11:30 NEED 7 more people
Saturday 11:30 – 2:30 NEED 7 more people

Consider volunteering for whatever time you can. Sign up using this link

Call Amanda Kost with questions: 440-864-6543
